title: Capacitance - Effect of area on capacitance and PD

content.question: Which of the following correctly indicates how the capacitance and the potential difference between the plates changes as the bottom plate is moved? Capacitance Potential Difference A Decreases Decreases B Decreases Increases C Increases Decreases D Increases Increases

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
